tool_description: Official GraphQL API for dropmail.me temporary 10 minute email service (temp mail).

api_list.name: GraphQL
api_list.description: All the requests are executed via a single endpoint. For the quickstart, try `mutation{introduceSession{id, addresses{address}}}` mutation. It will create a new server-side email storage with `id` and a single email address attached to it. Then use `query session(id: "..sessionId..") {mails{text, headerSubject}}` query to read incoming mail.
